name: Math Defender
description:
A simple math game to train your mind and make you better in maths. Let us all focus on something more educational and productive. Are you smart enough and fast enough to break the game? Prove it!!!

Gameplay: 

  • You can have multiple mixed operations at the same time .
  • You can speed up the incoming deadly fire.
  • Answer correctly :)

Tips for collecting more points:

  • Select multiple operations at the same time [Turn them green]
  • Select a faster speed [Turn them green]
